ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Combat
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t believe we have a feature to block certain subjects. Egroups had much easier utilities to work with. Yahoo makes you jump through hoops to get things
ygData.messageBody:
I don't believe we have a feature to block certain subjects. Egroups had
much easier utilities to work with. Yahoo makes you jump through hoops to
get things done.
I can add a note that outwar and everwar stuff is not allowed to be posted.
And then I can kick anyone who posts that stuff.
luv,
-Su

> Is there a way to block these everwar and outwar spams?
>

> From: Ken King [mailto:firedragons2@...]
> Sent: den 22 maj 2003 17:53
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Combat

> Ken
